metadata.title: CVE-2016-10937 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: IMAPFilter through 2.6.12 does not validate the hostname in an SSL certificate. It was discovered that IMAPFilter incorrectly validated SSL certificates. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to intercept secure communications.

criterions.comment: imapfilter package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.6.13-1').
